channel.title: What do you think the next CoD Game will be?
channel.description: In my opinion, The Modern Warfare series is done, So i think they will Start a new series. Your Opinions?

item.title: What do you think the next CoD Game will be?
item.dc:creator: @MacaYork MacaYork
item.description:
@MacaYork wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:14, topic:509367”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=627615.msg4266562#msg4266562 date=1364108986]
clearly since modern warfare is probably finished it would be time to go to Futuristic warfare
[/quote]
Well no, I’m sure everyone knows Activison by now and should realize that they will do anything and everything that would allow them to drag out the series for as long as possible. Whether that is a Ghost story or just a prequel, who knows?

I know its a risk to the series but I do hope they do something with Ghost, even though there is no reason for Ghost to come back but I’m sure with enough thought some magic can happen.[/quote]

Ghost fights his way out of hell
Call Of Duty: Underworld

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think the next CoD Game will be?

item.title: What do you think the next CoD Game will be?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

clearly since modern warfare is probably finished it would be time to go to Futuristic warfare

Well no, I’m sure everyone knows Activison by now and should realize that they will do anything and everything that would allow them to drag out the series for as long as possible. Whether that is a Ghost story or just a prequel, who knows?

I know its a risk to the series but I do hope they do something with Ghost, even though there is no reason for Ghost to come back but I’m sure with enough thought some magic can happen.

Read full topic

item.source: What do you think the next CoD Game will be?

item.title: What do you think the next CoD Game will be?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“MacaYork, post:8, topic:509367”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=627615.msg4266178#msg4266178 date=1364075819]

I really hope they dont resort to this but with the successes of the crysis and halo franchises i could really see the next one being:

Call Of Duty: Future Warfare

it would run like the modern warfare series and be set around 2100 so some guns we recognise may still be there but most of them will be futuristic,

like i said i really hope they dont do this as i wouldnt buy it.

They already started the idea of future warfare with MW3 and Black Ops 2 (i think)
MW3 wasn’t a real war
[/quote]

i know it wasnt a real war but its set near to our time, also like you said they have set up the idea and maybe a black ops + modern warfare storyline could crossover in the new game if they did make Future Warfare[/quote]

I feel like they’re going to bring in aliens soon… Just saying. It’s easier to create a war-storyline about fighting aliens on Earth, than making up an entire war between the countries. It’s like “Hey they invaded and want to rule the planet, fight them”. But with global warfare, it’s like “Oh they did this, we did that, fight for this, save that” etc.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think the next CoD Game will be?

I really hope they dont resort to this but with the successes of the crysis and halo franchises i could really see the next one being:

Call Of Duty: Future Warfare

it would run like the modern warfare series and be set around 2100 so some guns we recognise may still be there but most of them will be futuristic,

like i said i really hope they dont do this as i wouldnt buy it.

They already started the idea of future warfare with MW3 and Black Ops 2 (i think)
MW3 wasn’t a real war[/quote]

i know it wasnt a real war but its set near to our time, also like you said they have set up the idea and maybe a black ops + modern warfare storyline could crossover in the new game if they did make Future Warfare
